summary: Find him at The Bannered Mare (Whiterun).
descriptionHtml:
[DESCRIPTION]

This is another follower I created with the Creation Kit. He is a nord male and hangs around The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He should be marriable. I used a savegame to export the face map and import it to CK.

[INSTALLATION]

Just un-zip the file and copy it to your Data folder (located in C/Programs/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/).

[REQUIREMENTS]

For a proper appearance you need:

Better males by Chris57 and FavoredSoul (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488)

ApachiiSkyhair (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168) and optional colour file.

High res face maps (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141)

Better Male Presets (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15641)

High Resolution Scars (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784)

[KNOWN ISSUES]

None.
author: Faraodir
